title: Finished at Last….?
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Kanan-san! This training plan is really great nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ehehe, is that so? It was worth thinking it over with Umi-chan then<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Umi-chan also said that Rin will probably like it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>So then, Rin-chan, did you like it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yeah! Rin really loves this training plan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>It’s a bit different than a normal triathlon though, is that okay? Is there any part that’s too painful?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Umm, uhh, the first part was running like, swoosh, right? Rin loves running, so Rin is happy having it at the start. Then, after Rin is all heated up from the running, swimming felt really nice nya~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, that’s true, huh. Diving into the ocean after running is the best<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin thinks everyone will definitely like it nya. Rin can’t wait to do it with everyone else!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah, after this, let’s ask the rest of the girls who haven’t done it yet. Al~right, Rin-chan, how many more sets can you go?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin can still just go nya~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I see, I guess everyone will be fine if I add a few more sets to this training plan♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
